name: @sozialhelden/ietf-language-tags
author: Sebastian Felix Zappe <sebastian@sozialhelden.de>
description: Helps you working with IETF language tags as specified by BCP 47 / RFC 5646.

scripts.build:esm: tsc -m es2020 --target esnext --outDir dist/esm && echo '{ "type": "module" }' > dist/esm/package.json
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -m commonjs --target esnext --outDir dist/cjs && echo '{ "type": "commonjs" }' > dist/cjs/package.json
scripts.build:compile-json:
find src/json/*.json | xargs -I {} sh -c 'printf "// @ts-ignore
export default " > {}.ts && cat {} >> {}.ts && rm {}'
scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:copy-json && npm run build:compile-json && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.test:prod: npm run lint && npm run test -- --coverage --no-cache
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish --access public
